data.name: Wetory
data.detailed_description:
[Game introduction]


A child abandoned from the world immediately after birth due to a congenital disease
When all the colors of the world were taken away by the villain,
Realizing that his illness is the power to defeat the villain,
Join us in our adventure to regain the color which lost to the villain!

It's a 3D game based on a tile map that allows players to interact with a tile map rather than directly attacking it
It is a game that has a differentiated WeTory style of play that attacks and avoids through it.

[Unique way of playing games]


Instead of directly attacking, the player attacks and avoids by interacting with a tile map
Play the game strategically because players can't attack when you want to!

[Following own your way of playing with various skills]


Wetory has its own characteristics of attack in each color
It has a skill set that takes advantage of its unique attack characteristics.
Each stage regains a certain color and utilizes various color capabilities to play the game.
Through this, the player can utilize the skill points he gained from playing the game
You can build your own way of playing, and with a skill reset system,
Initialize Skiltree to play the game strategically!

data.short_description: A child abandoned from the world immediately after birth due to a congenital disease When all the colors of the world were taken away by the villain, Realizing that his illness is the power to defeat the villain, Join us in our adventure to regain the color which lost to the villain!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-9400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660S
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest macOS
  • Processor: Core i5-9400F equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660S equivalent or higher
